title: Li'l Abner aka Trouble Chaser (1940) Buster Keaton | Comedy | Full Length Movie

sources.title: Li'l Abner aka Trouble Chaser (1940) Buster Keaton | Comedy | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Li'l Abner becomes convinced that he is going to die within 24 hours, so he agrees to marry two different girls: Daisy Mae and Wendy Wilecat.

Director: Albert S. Rogell
Writers: Charles Ker, Tyler Johnson 
Stars: Jeff York, Martha O'Driscoll, Mona Ray, & Buster Keaton
Genre: Comedy, Classics, Cult film
